title: Telnet Receive Function
description:
TN_RECEIVE receives input data from the Telnet client, and 

evaluates the key codes.

If the key code in the range 32-126 it shall be stored as ASCII code under 

Xus_TN_SCREEN, by_Input_ASCII_Code. In addition, 

Xus_TN_SCREEN.bo_Input_ASCII_IsNum = TRUE if this corresponds to a 

number between 0 and 9.

If the key code is of the following extended code then this is fled under 

Xus_TN_SCREEN,by_Input_Exten_Code.

Exten_code Button name

65 Cursor up

66 Cursor down

67 Cursor RIGHT

68 Cursor left

72 Pos1

75 End

80 F1

81 F2

82 F3

83 F4

8 Backspace

182 Version 1.21

Chapter 11. Telnet-Vision

9 Tabulator

13 Return (Enter)

27 Escape
name: TN_RECEIVE

input.name: Xus_TN_SCREEN
input.description: Structure to hold the result of the Telnet input processing.

fields.name: by_Input_ASCII_Code
fields.description: The ASCII code received from the Telnet client.

fields.name: bo_Input_ASCII_IsNum
fields.description: Indicates if the received ASCII code corresponds to a numeric value (0-9).

fields.name: by_Input_Exten_Code
fields.description: An extended code representing specific function keys.

input.name: R_BUF
input.description: Buffer that holds the data received from the Telnet client.
